comments.author: Christophe Lombart
comments.body:
Done in the subproject  jcr-nodemanagement
The subproject "Spring" is not migrated because the same code is in the spring module project. I will review it and if necessary I will send patches to this project

description: Review package structure and graffito references in the other OCM subprojects : jcr-nodemanagement & spring.
summary: Review pck names in the others ocm subprojects
